meta.label: API configuration
meta.description: Define presets for users to call the API with specific credentials, quota and parallelization parameters

params.name: separator_authentication
params.label: Authentication
params.description: Please refer to the AWS documentation: https://boto3.amazonaws.com/v1/documentation/api/latest/guide/configuration.html.

params.name: aws_access_key
params.label: AWS access key ID
params.description: If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: aws_secret_key
params.label: AWS secret access key
params.description: If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: aws_region
params.label: AWS region
params.description: If empty, attempts to ascertain region name from the environment.

params.name: separator_api_quota
params.label: API quota
params.description: Throttling to stay within the quota defined by AWS: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rekognition_region.html#limits_rekognition

params.name: api_quota_period
params.label: Period
params.description: Reset period of the quota in seconds. Defined by AWS.

params.name: api_quota_rate_limit
params.label: Rate limit
params.description: Maximum number of requests per period for one DSS activity. Reduce for concurrent activities.

params.name: parallel_workers
params.label: Concurrency
params.description: Number of threads calling the API in parallel (maximum 100). Increase to speed-up computation within the quota defined above.
